attributes.action: let UK citizens freely protest anywhere in the UK and wear symbols of protest
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Currently we are restricted as to where, how and when we can protest in the UK, normal citizens of the UK can be legally turned into serious criminals and 'terrorists' if they protest in restricted areas, we can also be arrested anywhere in the UK for wearing politically offence items of clothing, turning anyone into a criminal, while not catching real criminals.
We want a free country, and the Prime Minister should not be able to express Britain as a country which promotes free speech. It needs to change.
